title: Allu Arjun was normal in jail, had rice and vegetable curry in dinner: Official - Hindustan Times
summary:
Allu Arjun was normal in jail, had rice and vegetable curry in dinner: Official

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Allu Arjun, who was jailed following an incident at a film premiere, spent a normal night in prison and had rice and vegetable curry for dinner, according to an official from Telangana's prisons department.

  • Allu Arjun spent a night in Chanchalguda Central Prison after being arrested in the 'Pushpa 2' stampede case.
  • The actor was granted a four-week interim bail on the day of his arrest but was not released until the following morning.
  • During his time in jail, he did not request any special privileges and was treated as a special prisoner as per court order.
  • The delay in his release was due to procedural issues, as inmates are not typically released after 7 PM.
  • The incident at the movie premiere resulted in the death of a woman, leading to charges against Arjun and his security team.
“He was quite normal and did not appear depressed. Normally, the dinner time is 5:30 pm. However, late admissions are also served food. He had rice and vegetable curry.”

The situation highlights the challenges faced during high-profile releases and the implications of crowd management at events.

'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 10: The film sees huge growth of 71 percent on Saturday, post Allu A - TOI Etimes
summary:
'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 10: The film sees huge growth of 71 percent on Saturday, post Allu Arjun's arrest; crosses Rs 820 crore

Publication Date: [Insert Date] Source: [Insert Source]

Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2' has been breaking box office records, achieving a remarkable 71 percent growth in collections on its tenth day, despite the recent arrest of its star.

  • The film grossed Rs 62.3 crore on its second Saturday.
  • Of the total, Rs 46 crore came from the Hindi version and Rs 13 crore from the Telugu version.
  • The total box office collection now stands at Rs 824 crore in India across all languages.
  • The Hindi version of the film has so far collected Rs 498 crore, surpassing its Telugu counterpart.
  • The film has outperformed previous hits like 'Jawan' and 'RRR' in terms of total collection.
"This kind of growth is just unprecedented."

The success of 'Pushpa 2' continues to defy expectations, with further growth anticipated as the film remains in the spotlight following its controversies and increasing ticket sales.

summary:
Ram Charan’s performance as Appanna in Game Changer will shock everyone – Srikanth

Published on: Dec 15, 2024, 2:59 am IST

Ram Charan's upcoming dual role in the political drama Game Changer, directed by Shankar, is generating significant buzz, particularly regarding his performance as Appanna, which is expected to surprise audiences.

  • Ram Charan plays dual roles: a father (farmer Konidela Appanna) and son (IAS officer Konidela Ram Nandan).

summary:

title: Dilli ka Dil luteya! When Brown Munde, AP Dhillon, Honey Singh and Jazzy B came together for an unforgettable night - Hindustan Times
summary:
Dilli ka Dil luteya! When Brown Munde, AP Dhillon, Honey Singh and Jazzy B came together for an unforgettable night

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Indo-Canadian rapper and singer AP Dhillon made an unforgettable debut in the Capital on Saturday night at the Indira Gandhi Stadium, which turned into a musical carnival with surprise performances by Punjabi music icons Jazzy B and Yo! Yo! Honey Singh.

  • Jazzy B performed his classic Dil Luteya and Honey Singh brought his hit Millionaire.
  • AP Dhillon opened the show with signature hits like Excuses and Brown Munde.
  • Dhillon performed tracks from his latest EP, including Bora Bora and Old Money.
  • The concert atmosphere was electric, with Dhillon engaging the crowd and urging them to make some noise.
  • The event celebrated Dhillon's journey as a global Punjabi artist and his impact on modern Punjabi pop music.
“Delhi, are you having fun? Make some noise!”

As the night ended on a euphoric note, Delhi was left buzzing, showcasing AP Dhillon’s ability to blend tradition with modernity and create unforgettable moments for his fans.

title: Allu Arjun arrest: Telangana congress president says law will take its course - Hindustan Times
summary:
Allu Arjun arrest: Telangana congress president says law will take its course

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

B Mahesh Kumar Goud, the Congress president in Telangana, commented on the arrest of popular Telugu actor Allu Arjun, stating that the legal process is being followed, and expressed that the party holds no ill will against film actors.

  • Goud stated that the cases against Arjun are legal and he has been granted bail.
  • He emphasized Congress's supportive stance towards cinema heroes, citing historical support for the Telugu film industry.
  • The arrest of Allu Arjun arose from an incident during the premiere of his film 'Pushpa 2' where a fan jostling led to a woman's death.
  • Goud criticized BJP leaders for politicizing the situation regarding the arrest.
  • He mentioned the need for lawful action against BRS leader K T Rama Rao if irregularities are found in connection to a past race event in Hyderabad.
"The cases filed against Arjun are within the purview of law and the court granted him bail," said Goud.

This incident highlights the intersection of celebrity culture and legal affairs, as political leaders navigate public sentiment and legal processes simultaneously.

title: Mohan Babu Says Anticipatory Bail NOT Rejected In Journalist Assault Case: 'False Propaganda' - News18
summary:
Mohan Babu Says Anticipatory Bail NOT Rejected In Journalist Assault Case: 'False Propaganda'

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: News18

Veteran actor Mohan Babu has clarified that his anticipatory bail petition has not been rejected, countering false reports circulating in media.

  • Mohan Babu clarified via social media that his anticipatory bail has not been rejected.
  • He stated he is currently under medical care and requested accurate reporting from the media.
  • The statement follows reports claiming a rejection by the Telangana High Court regarding his bail plea related to an attack on a journalist.
  • Mohan Babu apologized for the incident, which he described as “unfortunate,” asserting he acted in self-defense against anti-social elements.
  • He expressed regret for the injury sustained by the journalist in the incident he described.
“False propaganda is being circulated! Anticipatory bail has NOT been rejected and currently, I am under medical care in my home. I request the media to get the facts right."

The actor's statement aims to clear misconceptions regarding his legal situation, emphasizing the need for factual reporting amid ongoing legal challenges.

The Second Saturday has significantly boosted Pushpa 2's position in its quest to break lifetime records, particularly that of Baahubali 2.

title: Saira Banu recalls Raj Kapoor kneeling before Dilip Kumar after their marriage, shares Dilip Kumar's emot - TOI Etimes
summary:
Saira Banu recalls Raj Kapoor kneeling before Dilip Kumar after their marriage, shares Dilip Kumar's emotional moment to Raj Kapoor's cardiac arrest

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Veteran actress Saira Banu paid a heartfelt tribute to the legendary Raj Kapoor on his 100th birth anniversary, sharing an emotional video on Instagram that highlighted his cherished bond with her late husband, Dilip Kumar.

  • Saira shared a touching video showcasing jovial moments between Raj Kapoor and Dilip Kumar.
  • She emphasized their deep friendship, dispelling myths of professional rivalry.
  • Notable memories include Raj teasing Dilip about marriage and kneeling before him on his wedding day.
  • Saira recounted an emotional scene from Raj Kapoor's final days, where Dilip rushed back to see him after a cardiac arrest.
  • She concluded her tribute by reflecting on their profound connection and the essence of their friendship.
“They weren’t just legends. To each other, they were home—an anchor in turbulent waters, a source of strength in moments of weakness.” - Saira Banu

This tribute serves as a reminder of the deep bonds of friendship that transcend time and circumstance, celebrating the legacies of both iconic figures in Indian cinema.

title: Report: Mrunal Thakur and this Bollywood couple likely to be part of Spirit - 123telugu

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 7:11 pm IST

The upcoming Telugu film "Spirit," directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga, might feature Mrunal Thakur in the lead role alongside renowned Bollywood couple Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan as antagonists.

With high expectations surrounding this project, "Spirit" is poised to attract significant attention, showcasing an exciting blend of talent from different film industries.

title: Jr NTR shows solidarity with Allu Arjun over arrest for fan death during Pushpa 2 premiere - Hindustan Times
summary:
Jr NTR shows solidarity with Allu Arjun over arrest for fan death during Pushpa 2 premiere

Date: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Jr NTR, while filming in Mumbai, reached out to Allu Arjun following his release on interim bail concerning a tragic incident during the Pushpa 2 premiere, where a fan died due to asphyxiation.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested in connection with a fan's death at the Pushpa 2 premiere and was released on interim bail.
  • Numerous Tollywood celebrities, including Jr NTR and Vijay Deverakonda, showed support for Arjun after his return home.
  • The stampede occurred as Arjun visited Sandhya Theatre for the film's premiere, causing chaos among fans.
  • The police filed an FIR against Arjun and the theatre management, leading to his arrest.
"Tarak is out of town and busy shooting... He called Allu Arjun as soon as he could once he heard that he was back home." - Source close to Jr NTR

The incident highlights the intense fan fervor and the responsibilities of public figures in managing large crowds during events.

title: Mukesh Khanna ‘Refused’ To Sell Shaktimaan’s Rights To YRF; Says They Would’ve Turned It Into ‘Disco Drama’ - News18
summary:
Mukesh Khanna ‘Refused’ To Sell Shaktimaan’s Rights To YRF; Says They Would’ve Turned It Into ‘Disco Drama’

Publication Date: December 15, 2024, 00:42 IST

Source: News18

Mukesh Khanna, the iconic Shaktimaan actor, turned down an offer from Yash Raj Films to sell the rights of his character, stating he didn't want it to be turned into a 'disco drama'.

  • Mukesh Khanna claims he was contacted by Aditya Chopra's team about selling the rights ten years ago.
  • He refused the offer and instead presented a counter-offer, indicating his desire to retain control over the character.
  • Khanna expresses support for Allu Arjun as a potential Shaktimaan in a reboot but criticizes Ranveer Singh's suitability for the role.
  • Shaktimaan originally aired from 1997 to 2005 and remains a beloved figure in Hindi television.
“I told them, ‘Tell Aditya, whoever he is, if you want to make it, make it with me’. I didn’t want to give away the rights only for them to make a disco drama. I refused." - Mukesh Khanna

This reflection emphasizes Khanna's commitment to maintaining the integrity of the Shaktimaan character amidst potential commercialization by major film studios.

title: ‘Kapil Sharma sat next to me for 10 minutes, ignored me throughout’: Mukesh Khanna slams comedian for having ‘no courtesy’, calls his show ‘obscene’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Kapil Sharma sat next to me for 10 minutes, ignored me throughout: Mukesh Khanna slams comedian for having ‘no courtesy’, calls his show ‘obscene’

Publication Date: Date not specified Source: The Indian Express

Veteran actor Mukesh Khanna, known for his role in Mahabharat, discusses his reasons for declining an appearance on Kapil Sharma's show, criticizing its content as "obscene".

  • Khanna was never contacted by the show's producers and would have declined anyway due to content concerns.
  • He believes the show's humor relies on "ashlilta" (obscenity) and below-the-belt jokes.
  • Khanna shared a past encounter where Kapil Sharma ignored him at an award function, questioning Sharma's courtesy.
  • He expressed disapproval of a promo where Kapil asked actor Arun Govil a crass question, regarding Lord Ram.
  • Khanna commented on the lack of respect in asking inappropriate questions to respected actors.
  • He took a dig at Kapil’s comedy style and his cross-dressing antics on the show.
"Though people laugh, mujhe koi shalinta nahi dikhti (I don’t see any decency in it)." - Mukesh Khanna

Khanna's critique highlights a significant division between traditional values in comedy and contemporary humor, emphasizing the need for respect in public discourse.

summary:
Samantha Ruth Prabhu is ‘not crying’ watching Allu Arjun's emotional reunion with wife Sneha Reddy and kids

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun had an emotional reunion with his family after being released from jail on interim bail, following his arrest in connection to a tragedy at the premiere of his film, Pushpa 2: The Rule.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested due to a fan's death during a chaotic premiere event.
  • He returned home on Saturday morning to hugs from his family, including his wife and children.
  • Samantha Ruth Prabhu reacted to the moment on her Instagram, stating, "I am not crying, okay!"
  • Vignesh Shivan expressed condolences and praised Arjun’s maturity in handling the situation.
  • Other celebrities, including Varun Dhawan and Rashmika Mandanna, showed support for Arjun during this difficult time.
“Waited to only see this! Very very unfortunate to go through this @alluarjunonline sir, but the way he handled this was very mature and dignified.” - Vignesh Shivan

This incident has drawn significant attention from both fans and the media, highlighting the pressures faced by celebrities in the public eye.

title: Kangana Ranaut criticizes Bollywood for losing touch with reality: All they care about is going to the gy - TOI Etimes
Pushpa 2 (Hindi) Day 10 Box Office Trends: Allu Arjun starrer scores biggest second Saturday in history of Hindi Cinema - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 (Hindi) Day 10 Box Office Trends: Allu Arjun starrer scores biggest second Saturday in history of Hindi Cinema

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Allu Arjun-led Pushpa 2 has achieved a remarkable milestone, setting a record for the highest second Saturday box office collection in the history of Hindi Cinema.

  • The film is expected to earn Rs 41 to Rs 43 crore on its 10th day, raising the total to Rs 458 crore.
  • It surpasses the previous record held by Stree 2, which collected Rs 33 crore on its second Saturday.
  • Pushpa 2’s second weekend collection is projected to reach Rs 115 crore, the highest ever.
  • Allu Arjun is on track to join the Rs 500 crore club by the second Sunday.
  • The film is likely to become the third biggest Hindi feature film in 13 days, surpassing numerous blockbusters.
“Pushpa 2 has established Allu Arjun as one of the most popular faces in the Hindi markets.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's unprecedented box office success positions it as a formidable contender in Indian cinema, with Allu Arjun possibly becoming a leading crowd-puller in the Hindi film industry.
